name: Waterfall of Sadness
description:
Level Design / Environmental Storytelling school project (2020). The purpose was to build a scene around a waterfall that would communicate a feeling, in my case, sadness. I achieved this humanizing the waterfall and building a short story behind her, as well as tuning sound effects and environment for maximum effect.

The project was meant to run on one very specific high end machine so some users may experience poor fps.

Solo project made by me, Valerio Marty Rodríguez, with special thanks to:

  • Lamp and lamp pole by classmate Pedro Yagüe Sánchez
  • Sky based on Jannik's procedural sky
